summary: Tested orders list functionality end-to-end. Backend APIs working correctly (9/9 tests pass). Frontend orders list displays correctly with 9 orders. Refresh button works. The reported issue 'User cannot see invoices/orders on /orders page' is NOT reproducible in preview environment.

minor.issue: Search filter (q parameter) only searches by orderNumber, not by customerName or customerMobile. Users might expect to search by customer name.

ui_bugs.issue: After successful login (API returns 200, token stored), page doesn't auto-redirect. User stays on /login and must manually navigate.

issues: React warning: Invalid prop 'error' of type 'string' supplied to TextField, expected 'boolean'

action_items: INVESTIGATE: User's local environment - the issue 'orders not showing' is not reproducible in preview. May be a caching issue, auth token issue, or local environment problem.
FIX (optional): Add auto-redirect after successful login in Login.jsx or AuthContext.jsx
FIX (optional): Extend search to include customerName and customerMobile in /api/orders
FIX: Change error prop from string to boolean in CreateProduct component TextField
critical_code_review_comments: list.jsx correctly uses Redux store (listOrdersAction) and dispatches on mount via useEffect
createOrderAction in orders.js correctly calls listOrdersAction after successful creation to refresh the list
The fetchOrders callback is correctly memoized with useCallback and depends on [dispatch, filters]
Refresh button onClick correctly calls fetchOrders function
API response structure is correct: {status: 200, data: {count, rows}}

success_rate.frontend: 90% (orders list works, refresh works, minor login redirect issue)

seed_data_creation: Created multiple test orders during API testing: TEST_API_Customer, TEST_List_Verify_Customer, TEST_SearchUnique_Customer, TEST_Redux_Integration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Orders functionality is working correctly in preview environment. The reported issue may be specific to user's local environment. Backend has 9 passing tests covering CRUD operations, pagination, search, and sorting. Frontend orders list displays correctly with refresh functionality working. Login has minor redirect issue but auth works.

backend_api.GET /api/orders: PASS - Returns orders with count and rows

frontend_ui.refresh_button: PASS - Triggers API call and refreshes data

redux_integration.listOrdersAction: PASS - Fetches and stores orders in Redux state
